name: cycle-tingodb-driver
description: A tingoDB driver for cycle.js (server side)
author: Mark 'kaosat-dev' Moissette

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run compile-lib ; git commit -a -m 'Build lib/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run compile-lib ; git commit -a -m 'Build lib/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run compile-lib ; git commit -a -m 'Build lib/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags
